title: problem with launch
body: got a new computer an tried to down load lol and it will not go past the launch screen have tried to uninstall and tried to go to the web site an down load the game and same issue plz help

replies.body: Launch screen as in the patcher or you only see the League Logo after clicking the shortcut and nothing else happens? I'll need a few more details so I can understand what's going on.
the yellow bar under the league logo stuck in the midle
hey targons blade I'm having that problem where the league logo pops up and nothing happens, any ideas on what the issue is?
